PackageOracle.name: DA_SALES_REP
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SALES_REP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.337777000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,sales_rep_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,valid_from_dt IN DATE
,valid_to_dt IN DATE
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,sales_rep_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_sales_rep;

body.name: DA_SALES_REP
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SALES_REP
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.348158000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,sales_rep_id IN VARCHAR2
,billing_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,valid_from_dt IN DATE
,valid_to_dt IN DATE
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_rep.add, parms=' || associate_id || '|' || sales_rep_id || '|' || billing_system_id || '|' || valid_from_dt || '|' || valid_to_dt || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_sales_rep a
(
a.associate_id
,a.sales_rep_id
,a.billing_system_id
,a.valid_from_dt
,a.valid_to_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.associate_id
,add.sales_rep_id
,add.billing_system_id
,add.valid_from_dt
,add.valid_to_dt
,'A'
,add.data_source_type_cd
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_rep.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,sales_rep_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_rep.del, parms=' || associate_id || '|' || sales_rep_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_sales_rep a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.associate_id = del.associate_id
AND a.sales_rep_id = del.sales_rep_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_rep.del');

END del;

END da_sales_rep;
